title: The Scripture directory for church-officers and people, or, A practical commentary upon the whole third chapter of the first Epistle of St. Paul to the Corinthians to which is annexed The godly and the natural mans choice, upon Psal. 4, vers. 6, 7, 8 / by Anthony Burgesse ...
author: Burgess, Anthony, d. 1664.
publisher: Printed by Abraham Miller for T.U. and are to be sold by Thomas Underhill, George Calvert, and Henry Fletcher ...,
